package.name: sudo
package.unpack: if [ -f ${SRCDIR}/${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}.tar.bz2 ] ; then tar xjf ${SRCDIR}/${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}.tar.bz2 else tar xzf ${SRCDIR}/${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}.tar.gz fi
package.build: cd ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION} if [ -n "$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" ] ; then jobcount=` expr $DISTCC_HOSTCOUNT '*' 2 ` export CC="distcc gcc" export CXX="distcc g++" ./configure --prefix=/usr --with-pam=no CC="distcc gcc" CXX="distcc g++" pump make -j $jobcount CC="distcc gcc" CXX="distcc g++" else ./configure --prefix=/usr --with-pam=no make fi
package.install:
cd ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION} make install DESTDIR=${TGTDIR} # rsync -avHP /usr/bin/sudo /bin/sudo
cat > ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin/check_lax_sudo << CHECK #!/static/bin/ash
PATH=/bin:/sbin:/usr/bin:/usr/sbin:/static/bin:/static/sbin export PATH
. /etc/rc.defaults . /etc/rc.subr/extractbootparams . /etc/rc.subr/colors
[ "\$laxsudo" -gt 0 ] && exit 0 exit 1
CHECK
chmod 0755 ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin/check_lax_sudo
